name: The Brand New "CRUSH" CD!
description: Anthony Skinner’s latest is a celebration Radiohead-inspired rock with less cynicism and happier guitars.—Josh Jackson, Paste “Crush”(EP), is the BRAND NEW 6 Song CD from Anthony Skinner “Crush” is laden with unforgettable hooks, great songwriting and bodes an impressive list of contributors the likes of Tommy Sims (producer and bass player for Bruce Springsteen), Doyle Bramhall (artist and sideman for Eric Clapton) and the McCrary Sisters, (associated with country legends to rock icons such as Bob Dylan), as well as greats David Campbell (Beck, Elton John, Paul McCartney, Sheryl Crow, James Taylor, Carole King, etc) and Alan Sides (Count Basie, Goo Goo Dolls, Mary J. Blige, Eric Clapton, etc). Item usually shipped within 2 days.

name: FOREVER and A DAY
description: ‘Forever and A Day’, is a passionate live gospel/worship recording that has garnered critical acclaim. “With a live feel that sometimes flows into a spontaneous expression, Forever and a Day is a disarming, pure-hearted gem… Anthony Skinner’s clear-eyed acoustic love songs and prayers brim over with childlike, unabashed love, straight to the heart of God. From the first listen, Forever and a Day will make you smile, dance, sigh and worship.”-BE (Relevant Magazine) (Forever and a Day, received RELEVANTmag’s highest ratings in all of the three catagories it rates CD’s) 5 of 5 Stars! Maya Strang (Relevant Magazine) Item usually shipped within 2 days.

name: SMOKE
description:
“Smoke”, is a powerfully and beautifully scored video, of highly original, moving, mosaic images, that focus on the week of the passion.

	Item usually shipped within 2 days.
